login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Log in to your MENAGO TASK account

register.title: Create team
register.subtitle: Sign up and start working with MENAGO TASK
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter the email address associated with your account and we'll send you a password reset link.
forgotPassword.successSubtitle: If an account with the provided email exists in the system, we've sent a password reset link.
forgotPassword.successMessage1: The password reset link is valid for 24 hours.
forgotPassword.successMessage2: If you didn't receive an email, check your spam folder or try again.

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter a new password for your account.
resetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
resetPassword.noToken: Missing password reset token in link
resetPassword.resetError: An error occurred during password reset
resetPassword.invalidLinkSubtitle: The password reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.successSubtitle: Your password has been successfully changed. You will be redirected to the login page.

teams.title: Your teams
teams.subtitle: Choose a team to work with
teams.noTeamsSubtitle: Create your first team to get started
teams.createSubtitle: Create a new team and become its owner

boards.title: Team boards
boards.subtitle: Manage projects and organize tasks in the selected team
boards.createSubtitle: Provide details for the new board and select members
boards.selectTeamSubtitle: Select a team from the list above to see its boards
boards.createFirstSubtitle: Create your first board to get started
boards.onlyAdminsCanCreate: Only team administrators can create boards

board.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this board? This operation is irreversible.
board.createListSubtitle: Enter a name for the new list

card.title: Card name
card.deleteCardConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the card "{{title}}"?

list.deleteListConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the list "{{title}}"? All cards in this list will be deleted.

team.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the team "{{name}}"? This operation is irreversible and will delete all boards, lists, cards and data associated with this team.
team.inviteSubtitle: Send a team invitation to email address
team.manageMembersSubtitle: Manage team members and their roles
team.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the team?
team.removeOwnerConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the team owner? You will become the new team owner.
team.inviteSuccess: User has been added to the team.
team.inviteSent: Invitation has been sent by email. User will receive a registration link.
team.unauthorized: You don't have permission to manage this team.

boardMembers.title: Board member management
boardMembers.subtitle: Add and remove board members
boardMembers.allTeamMembersAdded: All team members are already in this board
boardMembers.noPermissions: You don't have permission to manage members of this board
boardMembers.removeOwnerConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove the owner from board members? The board will remain active but the owner will lose access as a member.
boardMembers.removeMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the board?
boardMembers.selectTeamFirst: Please select a team first to add members to the board
